website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an inexpensive Little Tikes toy that's durable and will offer years of fun activity, this is a good option.
pros: A rugged and affordable basketball hoop that helps kids develop skills like hand and eye coordination and teamwork
Versatile, as it is adjustable and can be used by kids ranging from about 1.5 to 5 years
cons: A few customers complained about boxes arriving damaged, and of missing parts

website_summaries.verdict: Best for toddlers and younger basketball fans, this model is sturdy and durable.
pros: Parents appreciate the fast, easy assembly as well as the durable plastic construction
It's great for kids between 18 months and 5 years old
Versatile enough to be used indoors and outdoors
cons: Occasional issues with the net falling out during play

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance to not receive a faulty design unit...
customer_reviews.text: ... And I scored a defective unit. If only the manufacturer will listen to the one star reviews, they would address the design flaw for the loose hoop. This product could of been improved with some sort of lock and pin mechanism behind the backboard to secure the hoop. In the pictures, the hoop was pushed all the way in and it still droops down after little pressure is placed on the hoop. I admit I took a chance on this as I was hoping to not receive a defective one. Once I return this, it will probably be re-packaged and shipped to another buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Christophe Le

customer_reviews.title: The toy itself was fine, but I am disgusted to have received it ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not come in a Little Tikes box. Instead, the parts were simply thrown in a shipping box without even a packing slip. The toy itself was fine, but I am disgusted to have received it in this condition when I paid full price for a brand new item. I would have returned it, but purchased for an angel child and had a deadline for turning in the toys.
customer_reviews.author: santasaur

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved Basketball Set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this basketball hoop and plays with it often. Ours came with 3 balls, since I bought the one that said it had 3 balls. The hoop is height adjustable, so I have been adjusting it to his height since we've gotten it last year. I filled the base with sand and sealed the plug in place with some silicone. It is a little heavy for me to move around, but is worth it because it has not fallen over yet. I sealed the plug with silicone because I did not want my son figuring out how to open it and pour the sand out.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love that the height adjusts
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 yr old and I have to admit, we probably play with it as much as our toddler does. It's height adjustable which is great for growing kids. It come with 3 balls which you can be pumped if they deflate.
customer_reviews.author: mkysayTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old son loves it! It is very easy to assemble. For those that might be having trouble with the hoop part staying on, make sure you follow the instructions and make sure that it is snapped all the way in. The height adjustment feature is awesome, I can leave it low when my son wants to dunk on it like his dad or place it higher when he wants to shoot the ball and practice his skills! This is great for indoor or outdoor. It is a very durable set! I am extremely happy and satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyska Marie

customer_reviews.title: Basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old grandson absolutely LOVES this! I also bought the "my first basketball book" ( along with the baseball, football and soccer books) and he has learned many of the words to go with it. He puts the ball in the basket and says "DUNK" or "SHOOT" !! Very sturdy. I bought it early so he has it in the house, but they will probably put it outside as the weather warms up. As he grows we can make the height taller and I believe we can put water in the bottom to stabilize it. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tsh/Metro detroit

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to love! Super great
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to love! Super great. I think I had they same hoop when I was a kid, great company The Important stuff: Is this item worth the money? Yes Do I like this item? yes Would I buy this item again? yes Would I tell my friends and family about this item? Yes If my review has helped you could you please mark it as helpful. I would really appreciate that. Any major positives/negatives (if they occur) in the future will be updated. Great interaction with this seller MY RATINGS 5 STARS = PERFECT 4 STARS = GOOD 3 STARS = NEEDS SOME IMPROVEMENT 2 STARS = DISLIKE // WOULD NOT PURCHASE AGAIN 1 STAR = SENDING BACK
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nunes

customer_reviews.title: The rim isn't defective, as some users state.
customer_reviews.text: The rim won't droop if it's pushed ALL the way in. It's easy to think that it's fully connected when it's not. Give it a little extra force until you hear and feel it click on both sides. It took me a minute of fiddling with it before I figured it out, and for a moment I thought, I, too, had received a faulty unit. Turns it the design wasn't the problem. The user was.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Was pretty disappointed that the description and the insructions showed more ...
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty disappointed that the description and the insructions showed more height adjustments than it had. Showed 5 and there was only 3. Also shows them farther apart for more height. My grandson will outgrow it in no time. Other than that it's just o.k.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Boggs

customer_reviews.title: All-Star Producing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Durable for a destructive toddler (15 months) and so easy to assemble that Helen Keller could do it. If you’re looking to start training your kid to be your future payday, this hoop is it. It grows with your all-star and is perfect for your living room sports court. Most difficult part of the set up is straining the net on the loops, but again, it’s easy. Bring the family around for an intense game of horse before bedtime! Make no mistake, this is the very same hoop that LeBron James used to use and now look at him, talk about a return on investment!
customer_reviews.author: Medicine Man

customer_reviews.title: Defectiive!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo disappointed in this, the hoop seems to fit on really tight but after just a few baskets and/or throws the hoop jiggles itself loose and falls out. Wondering if hoop and/or backboard can be ? Or new ones sent? Do I return the whole darn thing? Would glueing it together work?
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a bunch of crap, this was bought as a gift and sent ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a bunch of crap, this was bought as a gift and sent to my grandson when he got it there was missing pieces and stuff in the box that didn’t even go with the item the backboard and blue tube to hold it together was not there, will not be buying from this again!! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Price

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball hoop for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It was super easy to put together and even easier to adjust the height when needed. I did have the problem like some other reviewers had which was the rim wouldnt stay in but I laid it down (rim side up) and pushed really hard till I heard a click on both sides. Now it's great and in there good. I would have given 5 stars BUT one of the balls came deflated. I thought I could just blow it back up but there is a hole in it. So that's a bummer but it's still a great active toy for my toddler to play with so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Rim comes off, won't tighten.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order the basketball goal for my 18 month grandson, because he's always so excited when his bigger brother plays basketball with his dad, however; The rim won't stay on the goal, everytime he throws the ball into the rim, it comes off :-( Not sure what to do, just want my grandson to be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Expected better from Little Tikes
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. You would expect better from this company but unfortunately this is very low quality and quite disappointing. The backboard pitches/leans forward and the hoop was warped right out of the box. This will only get worse with time and there really is no way to fix it. It’s a shame that all Little Tikes will do is repackage and ship this back out again, most likely what happened with the product I received as you could hear and feel the product shifting around in the box loosely. You’d expect more from this company, completely dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Hoop does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: The hoop will not stay on. Extremely disappointed and do not understand where all the positive reviews come from. The hoop falls out almost every time with little pressure.
customer_reviews.author: bonniewithxoxo

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boss's 2 year old son. 1) comes in a plan brown box 2) looks like a return 3) Only 1 ball was included when it should have 2 I don't know who's fault it is, AMAZON or Little Tikes but both should be ashamed to ship it in this way. I am embarrassed to just wrap it the way it came so I will have to just put it together (hoping all parts are included) and put a bow around it. MERRY CHRISTMAS....Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: MAGGIEMOO

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good
customer_reviews.text: It's really simple to put together, which is key when you have a two-year-old who inexplicably likes basketball despite being too short to get within multiple feet of a regulation basket, but it's very top heavy and will tip over easily. The base has the ability to be filled with sand, but the package doesn't come with sand. Also, the backboard is stiff and won't give up good bank shots, or at least that's the explanation I'm going with as to why a two-year-old beat me in a game of HORSE.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Polinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers (and their big brothers, too)
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler was watching his big brothers shoot hoops and really wanted to participate. So we got him this-- it's perfect size for him-- and placed it right next to the "big boy" basketball hoop. Every now and then he gets frustrated because he is trying to fit the big (real) basketball through this basket, and it doesn't fit, which is a good lesson for him to learn how object sizes work. His big brothers also like playing with this toy (with or without the toddler), so that's a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome basketball hoop and ball
customer_reviews.text: Awesome basketball hoop and ball! My kids love it! However we were disappointed in the false advertising or mistake as it only came with one ball instead of the three it said online. We already had opened up and discarded the box so we cannot return it. I would just like the extra 2 balls shipped to me without the hassle of sending everything back in.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kids
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My daughter loves playing with it the second I put it together. She did try to put the ball from the bottom up, but we went through the fundamentals and now she’s dunking like a champ. The net was the only issue I had. I tried to install it upside down convince that what looked liked the wide opening was the correct way, but it’s the end with the bigger loops. All in all it’s a great product and my daughter loves. And the fact that this one comes with 3 balls is great.
customer_reviews.author: Off Brand Dad

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk . Opened it and missing a part. I order things online because I’m a stay at home parent of special needs kids and don’t have tune to shop. Amazon will not remedy this unless I can return the item and I am not able to because I cannot haul this and my 2 kids out to do this because I got an incomplete item. So I’m stuck with something incomplete that was supposed to be brand new and complete in box. And it’s cheap and not the best anyway but for the price that’s to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little basketball hoop when the rim stays put!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little basketball hoop with a nice adjust function.... but the darn rim won’t stay put. After a couple baskets, it falls. Makes it super frustrating for a kid that wants to play (22 month old) but can’t fit the issue himself. Will try to find a way to permanently attach it. Update: Was able to muscle the hoop into clicking into the base correctly and now we no longer have issues with the hoop falling off! And now it’s a blast to play with, even for us adults!
customer_reviews.author: Mia B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for Three Boys!
customer_reviews.text: A great little basketball set, especially the option including three basketballs. As a Christmas gift for my 20 month old grandson, this selection was a real hit! His two older brothers (ages 9 and 4) were happy to play, too and everyone had their own basketball. This was a real incentive for the little one, as he has much more fun when the others are involved. The stand, base and net are very sturdy and assembly was simple. It's so nice when a toy seems to be one which will be enjoyed over time and I think this one will be. Even 'Dad' couldn't resist trying to make a few baskets!
customer_reviews.author: B. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old toddler loves this hoop. The height is completely adjustable and will grow with him. Three sturdy balls come with it and they do bounce! I think you are supposed to put sand in the bottom but we don't have that and it stays up fine. Assembly was so easy. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Goal, Net Design Could Use Some Work
customer_reviews.text: The goal itself is great! Extremely easy to put together, set up in seconds! Also, great that this version of the product (available only on Amazon to my knowledge) comes with multiple kid friendly basketballs already aired up! The only drawback of this goal is that the net is constantly requiring rework to keep all of the loops attached. I plan on figuring out a fix myself, but it seems like this could easily be fixed with just a little tweak to the rim design. Overall, a great product for kids to play with (my 2.5 year old daughter loves it!), just wish I didn't spend so much time fixing the net from falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Dragna

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My two year old can’t get enough of this, and it’s actually fun for the whole family. It was really easy to assemble and the adjustable height grows with the child. It comes with three balls and we’ve also been using small plastic balls we already owned, which adds a bit of challenge (lighter/heavier balls demand different amounts of force). My son feels so proud to get the balls in the hoop, it’s been such fun to watch him develop great skills.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We've had it about a month now, and honestly the kids have barely used it. However, it was really easy to put together, seems to be sturdy, and will hopefully last for quite some time. I'll update the review if any of that ends up not happening, but as it stands, it seems like I got exactly what I paid for...my kids just don't give a crap lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for 8 year old with special needs
customer_reviews.text: my son is special needs (CP) and he runs and screams and tries to dunk. This is great equipment for him to also learn hand eye coordination plus it is fun. Yes we do play in the house and his 13 year old brother and myself play whit this almost every day, We make shot like of the ceiling of the sidewall , in. It is a blast. One word of advice during install: you really have to push the hoop basket into the backboard forcefully or else the hoop will keep coming off. Once i did that - the hoop is in there snug doesn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: apopnj

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Hoop!!  Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: When I see the name "Little Tykes," I already know the product will be excellent. I have 6 grandchildren plus little nieces and nephews that I love buying things for. We have an older, taller version that our 21 month old niece can't reach. Thank God for Amazon and its fast (very fast) shipping! Saved the day! This is extremely easy to pop together. That's all you do! The height of the rim is 29" and the overall height is 44". What a great toy this is! And it comes with 3 very nice basketballs! You can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Christine LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay standing up
customer_reviews.text: Even when I fill the bottom with water, the basketball hoop always falls over and stays laying down in my backyard. I’d get a different hoop if I were you!
customer_reviews.author: E Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for little basketball lovers (and grandparents too)
customer_reviews.text: our 2-year-old grandson has had one at his house (since he could barely walk lol) but he wanted one at grandma's house too. He uses it every time he visits. He loves making baskets, and he's really good at it too! It has three height settings and we have it on the middle setting. We didn't put sand in the base and we think it's plenty stable without it. This also makes it easy to move if we want. We must admit, grandma and grandpa like to shoot too. This is a good quality and fun hoop!
customer_reviews.author: Pdx consumer

customer_reviews.title: Kid classic
customer_reviews.text: Typical kids b-ball hoop. If you had one as a kid, you know what this is. My son loves it. Twist the net strings together as you install them. That will keep the net from coming loose every time the ball goes through.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great little hoop set for 2 and 3 year olds
customer_reviews.text: With three soft and semi-bouncy balls, this set has everything you need to get your toddler off on his/her hoop dreams. Most of the time, the base actually helps the ball return in the direction of a shooter standing directly in front of the basket, and the whole thing is light weight enough that it will do no harm if your hoopster tips it over. A reasonable price for a quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Frank DLT

customer_reviews.title: good hoop overall.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this hoop except that they should have made the rim sturdier because when our toddler pulls on it, it bends a little which effects how the ball goes in. You can't bend it back either. But the height adjustment is great and it came with three balls.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Trachtman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 20 month old who loves basketball. Very easy to set up, and the adjustble height means he can use it for awhile! I also like that it came with 3 balls.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My LO got this for her second birthday. She loves it and it was easy to put together. We keep it in the house and its lots of fun. The balls (3) are nicely inflated and soft so they won't damage anything. I don't have sand or water in the base and it works just fine. its study on its now and it is easy to adjust in height. Great for LO's.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, and gets kids off the couch..
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson and he seems to love it, his parents do not let him sit and watch video after video and he loves balls or any sort and really seems to enjoy this toy/game. Not to mention he is 18 months and can throw a ball pretty good into the hoop, certainly a great eye hand co-ordination teacher... so fun and teaching a good skill... certainly a win win..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! My kid is dunking like Donovan Mitchell! ...Good luck rebounding, though.
customer_reviews.text: I love the hoop and so does my kiddo. So why only three stars? Whenever a ball goes through the hoop it hits the base just right and the ball shoots across the court, far away. The hoop really is great but this small design flaw makes playing on it a lot less entertaining. You have to chase down the balls, all over the place, because of the ricochet effect. 3 stars instead of 5 for that reason. Otherwise, super cool!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Hole in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Opening it I find there is a hole in the bottom. Leaks water and sand. Disappointed. Next child I'll go with the Chinese brand.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Can be filled with water and doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball hoop for kids. Bought for my son when he was 18 months old and he loves it. We kept it in the house for awhile but as he’s grown it’s begun to outgrow the house. So we filled the bottom with water, which it holds really well and doesn’t leak unless it’s tipped, and we moved it outside for him to be able to run and dribble and play. We have brought it back inside on occasion with the water in it and as long as it’s sitting flat and not being knocked over it doesn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: So I went a little old-school with this purchase because I remember when my kids had one of these and loved it. I purchased this one for my grandson’s 2nd birthday and he just thinks it is so much fun. I love that 3 balls are included because you’re not having to chase one ball around every time they throw it. It was a great price for such good entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Hole in base/poor design
customer_reviews.text: There’s a hole in the bottom of the base that’s supposed to be filled with sand. What the hell am I supposed to do with this? I’ll have to figure out a way to plug it. Absolute garbage; extremely disappointed with this. UPDATE: aside from the base being defective, it’s very poorly designed, making it much too difficult to fill with stand. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip B. Senerchia

customer_reviews.title: Possibly used?
customer_reviews.text: The box it shipped in was partly openend. The hoop and balls were thrown into the box as if the product was used. The rim of the hoop is bent/warped with scratchs and keeps popping off of the backboard. I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cutest adjustable hoop for kiddos & poolside!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot best the quality from Little Tikes. We love this hoop! It is perfect for both my 2 year old and my 7 year old. We love how easily adjustable it is for both kids and also how portable it is - we move it from the backyard to the side of the pool To the front foyer for playtime! Great buy, worth the few extra bucks to get the 3 balls vs. one.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Penny

customer_reviews.title: Partial Christmas for active 2 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that their was an upgraded version of this available- if I had I would have gotten that. No worries- if he likes basketball more so than golf or T-ball I will get him the upgraded version next Christmas. It looks like it can be used outside cause you can put sand or gravel in the base to weigh that model down. I got him the t-ball and golf sets as well.
customer_reviews.author: ZEB

customer_reviews.title: Hoop falls down constantly
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is adjustable, but it’s so poorly made that it’s almost impossible to play with. The hoop constantly comes off and my little one has fallen more than a few times because if it. It seems very unstable. It also took forever to put together. I hired a professional and it was difficult for him.
customer_reviews.author: NoraKnowsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Hoop always falls off
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed set up and the hoop falls off every time it also came crooked it was my sons 2nd birthday present he looved it but got frustrated every time the ball went through the hoop would fall
customer_reviews.author: Miranda rainwater

customer_reviews.title: Good for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: The basketball goal is easy to install. However, the cap to the base where we are supposed to put sand/water to weigh it down is a bit difficult to unwind. Additionaly, the net keeps coming undone from the hoop itself. The rim is a bit worn already and we barely used it for a few weeks. I can foresee the connectors for the net breaking off eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda Tai

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our almost four year old who loves it. He is about the same height at the basket so it is easy for him to slam dunk. It stands well on it's own without filling the base and stands really well when filled. My husband and I stand on one side of the room and shoot the three included balls across the room and see who can sink more. It is super fun and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: JUST PLAIN FUN
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun basketball set and with three included balls everyone can play. Also nice to have extra balls in case one croaks or goes missing. The adjustable height gives kids fun though years of growing. Toddler and Grammy approved! We have ours in the basement. Fifty pound bag of play sand did the job to sturdy the base (sand purchased at the Big Orange Box for about $4.00).
customer_reviews.author: HitesMites

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but needs strength with assembling
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my son’s backyard toys. It is a good product when you assemble it correctly. However, I don’t have strength to push down the ring as it kept on falling when I was the one who assembled it. It is pretty difficult if you don’t have that extra strength. Thankfully my husband did the job and it worked fine now. It is affordable and will last you many years.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Gormley

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but they don't make them like they used to...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it... have to admit so do I. Brings back a lot of childhood memories. It seems that they've gotten a little soft though... the baskets now are huge presumably so that its easier for kids to make it. I'm also unsure if it would hold up to having hard basketballs shot at. When I was a kid we used our old one out by the pool and would shoot mini real basketballs at it. That thing was a tank and had a really sturdy rim. This one seems more flimsy and thinner. Other than that, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: LuckySl7vin

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my grandson's 2 year birthday. Love, Love, Love It. Worth every penny. Came in a box package. Assembly is required. Approx. five easy steps. No tools required. Snaps together easily. Very sturdy. Good, hard, plastic. Net was perfect. Good be used for older children, probably up to five as you can adjust the height. He plays with it every day. Easy to move around the yard and porches.
customer_reviews.author: Jldaugherty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and loads of fun for my toddler. He loves it and has a blast every time we play with it. Shipped super fast too even though I didn't select rush shipping. Relatively sturdy but lightweight so no worry about it tipping over and hurting the kids (the base is hollow at first but i think you can fill it with something if you want it to stay in place a bit better).
customer_reviews.author: The Frugal Guy

customer_reviews.title: You must super glue the net on
customer_reviews.text: So this product is literally a 1/5 stars if you don't super glue the net on. I shot a SINGLE ball through the hoop and had three of the net connections come undone at one time! You can't enjoy playing when you have to constantly reconnect the net. The rim is slightly warped and it doesn't sit straight either, however, it is a $35 product, so what should we expect? Overall, once the net is super glued on it's something that you and your kids will have some fun with.
customer_reviews.author: Trying To Help :)

customer_reviews.title: SCORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My children had one of these when they were young and loved it so we bought this for our granddaughters. They are 15 months and love putting the basketball in the hoop (lowest setting). I think they will enjoy it for a few years to come. It's made just as sturdy as I remember with my own kids 20 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hoop for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoop for kids! My 2 year can easily make the hoops with the balls. It was very easy to put together too. The net will take a few minutes to attach as you look it through holes. The height also adjusts very easily, go it grows as your child grows. It came with 3 balls already with air. They are a little hard but taking a little air out them was no problem. Over all I am completely happy with this and would recommend to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Angb9110

customer_reviews.title: 2 Year Old Loves It...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 2 year old for Christmas. He loves ball sports already. This this seems durable and has no issues staying upright even without any weight in the base. Also has a pretty easy height adjustment system. Goes from about 3 ft to 4.5 feet maybe? The only issue is the net likes to come off some of the hooks. More of a fixable annoyance than anything though.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: inside basketball fun
customer_reviews.text: My 11 and 10 year old love this basketball set for inside play. They mounted it on a piece of furniture for height and went to town practicing their shots. Not bad for the price. It took one minute to snap the pieces together. The rim had to really be forced into place but once it snapped in, it never came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Natty C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the hoop. It came as described including the 3 basketballs & it has the capability of adjustable heights . I did get pretty lucky getting it just before Christmas. this is available under the prime delivery but just make sure you give yourself enough time because it’s not going to be the typical turnaround time considering the bulkiness of the product. But I’m overall super excited to teach the kids some basketball
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Be the cool aunt (uncle, parent, or grandparent) and get your little one this b-ball goal!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite moments from Christmas was watching the excitement of my 20-month-old nephew dunking the ball for the first time ever while we all cheered and applauded! This will be one of those toys that grows with him. I will be getting the same thing for my other nephew for his upcoming birthday!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Showed up missing pieces and damaged. My son was excited for me to put the hoop together so he could play basketball. It is missing the neck that connects to the backboard and the base has a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: David St James

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my child’s playground!
customer_reviews.text: Little Tikes is my absolute favorite toy brand! I love the quality of their toys. This was Easy to assemble, the only thing the netting sometimes detaches but other than that no complaints. I also like that it comes with three basketball. This makes a great addition to my toddlers backyard playground!
customer_reviews.author: ladydnyce

customer_reviews.title: Comes with 3 basket balls
customer_reviews.text: i bought this one over others because it came with three basket balls so the kids don't fight over the ball or if we lose one. (Cheaper to buy this then buy the set with one ball and separately purchase extra balls) Only issue is the net comes off fairly easy which is why I took a star off for durability. I am going to be glueing it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my grandson, age 3. The hoop disconnects from the backboard too easily (the design is crap, the hoop just pops into the backboard with nothing securing it to the backboard) and the more you use it the looser the hoop gets. So not worth the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Denean Winton Harris

customer_reviews.title: soso
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is a little light, there are several positions that can be adjusted, but it is too high, easy to shake, there is no fixed thing, so it is not recommended to adjust it too high, there are three balls, you can play with other children, adults can also, generally speaking, it is ok, but it feels a little expensive in the 30s.
customer_reviews.author: Yalan Yang

customer_reviews.title: Rim and net falls off CONSTANTLY
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually do negative reviews, but this is worth mentioning. I wasn’t expecting exceptional quality for a $34 plastic basketball hoop. Due to the fact that Little Tykes has been making this for years, I am annoyed that the and rim and net constantly fall off. After every 3 or so shots it falls off and I have to try to jam it back on. It has fallen on my son multiple times already. Other than that... my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 month old son and he loves it. It was super easy to put together as all the pieces clip together (no tools required. My husband had it assembled within minutes. It's also pretty sturdy without even filling the base, my son likes to pull things over. The net does occasionally come loose in places with frequent use but is super easy to string back on. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Hoopless in Seattle
customer_reviews.text: The red hoop does not stay inserted into the backboard once the ball hits it. I like the adjustable height but the problem with the hoop makes this not useable. My hope is that I can devise some kind of way to fasten them together.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon

customer_reviews.title: Rough and Tumble Kiddos Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: Instillation, easy. Our daughter actually helped her dad in putting it together.. Sturdiness, we subbed sand in the base for water without issue. Overall, very happy with the product. I bought it for my kid to get her outside more often and keep her active, which it definitely does. She gets the slam dunk concept but we're still fine tuning her jump shot. The only slight grievance I have would be with the three little basketballs that come with the hoop. We've only had the set about a week and already all the balls are flat... It really stinks for our little one since their bouncing is so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bean RR

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cool! It has a bunch of different height settings so it can grow along with your little ones. My son absolutely loves this, and sometimes will suddenly spring up, run up to it, and just start putting the basketballs through the hoop over and over. It is well-built and seems durable. I filled the bottom with sand to make sure it doesn't tip over, and it seems very steady. I have no regrets about purchasing this and I think it's going to get years of use.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions when assembling goal
customer_reviews.text: This basketball goal is perfect! My 2 year old loves it. It is adjustable, so it grows with them. My only problem was when I put it together I didn’t read the instructions. I simply pushed the goal on with my hands and it kept falling off. Once I pulled the instructions out, it showed that you need to push the goal in with your foot until it really clicks. It is very secure now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Comes with 3 basketballs. I filled the base with sand. Needed about 40lbs. The quality is not the best. With some serious use, it probably wont last a long time. Rim is a little flimsy and so is the connection point between the post and backboard.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this!!! Comes with 3 balls and is really easy to assemble. Before I bought this I read quite a few reviews saying it was hard to keep the net and rim on, but I have had no problems. I would suggest watching the assembly video if you have any of those problems. Overall great quality and value. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kitty2057

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great first hoop! I have yet to find any issues with it. It arrived early. I put it together in minutes. The balls that come with it are awesome but the kid balls we already had fit! The hoop was big enough. So that is awesome for us. The net is holding up well. It does adjust pretty well so we will have awhile to enjoy this toy. I definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Defected......
customer_reviews.text: *updating* dropped to 2 stars, tried to fill the base with water, and there is a defect in the plastic where the two pieces form the bottom so the water just spills out. Works great. My son loves it. Glad it comes with 3 basketballs so that he doesnt have to chase one around after each throw, and multiple kids can play. Love that the height is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: 29 years old and use it more than my child lol
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he has fun when he uses it but I was not ready for the amount of fun I was going to have with it also ha ha, I literally have said Kobe over 50 times since I got this, I missed a lot so it was more like Shaq lol great toy though just make sure to fill base up if your going to be dunking on it
customer_reviews.author: Jay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Maybe used?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a gift for my son and when we received it we thought maybe it was used? The body of the hoop is all scuffed up. We Clorox wipes everything and it’s not a huge deal to send back but not really cool when you’re thinking your buying something new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 2 year old, and he loves it! It was extremely simple to put together, and seems durable (we do need to weigh down the base still, but that will be easy enough to do). I love that we can adjust the height as our son grows, and I expect it will last him many years.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but could be heavier
customer_reviews.text: This is still a nice toy but I remember the plastic being heavier the first and second times I bought it about 12 yrs ago.. I am not sure why this quality has to change, but if it were any lighter, it would not be a good buy.. Go back to Old School Plastic, or get out of the toy business..
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer57

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for a kiddo
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great toy to get! We bought this for my almost 2 year old for Christmas and he loves it! I love that it can grow with him so it'll be great entertainment for years to come. We have it in our playroom and it doesn't take up too much space which is great. We don't have it weighed down as I feel it's pretty sturdy for now. We'll probably add something in the base when my kid gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Bugusky

customer_reviews.title: Good easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my 19 month old but the rim came warped slightly, nothing that is really affecting the use of the hoop, but just slightly annoying for paying money to have something not perfect. Otherwise, my son loves it! I also like that it already came with three balls and was wicked easy to put together took like 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia S.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: The net was woven together incorrectly. It’s Christmas Eve at 10:57pm so my husband had to cut it and tie a knot to make it work, but it looks pretty junky now and I don’t think it’s going to hold up. I’m incredibly disappointed. This was supposed to be from Santa. I wish we had time to return it and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fun
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up. Took about 3-5 minutes. The net took most of the time. A lot of people have had complaints about the rim not staying secure - I have had no issues. I can also tell that Tom Brady did not inflate these basketballs - they were good to go right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Warford

customer_reviews.title: Is not as sturdy.....
customer_reviews.text: So it’s all plastic is super easy to assemble. Only downside? It tilts forward and it’s not fully straight also if you have a little toddler who is a little savage filling it with with sand it’s a good way to keep it from falling. Especially when they grab the net and try to pull it. I just wish it was heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop, just like when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.text: So without filling the bottom piece it easily falls when it’s at a taller level. That’s easy to do though. Once filled it’s sturdy with no issues. This is just like when I was a kid and so happy I could have my kids play with it. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Parker

customer_reviews.title: Each part fits loosely into the next, leaving the rim slanted downward.
customer_reviews.text: The positive things are that the height is adjustable and it is not difficult to put together. I didn't expect a sophisticated product - it is a hoop for children - but at each articulation of the assembly there is significant slack and the rim droops downward several inches because of it. This was at the initial setup before the first shot. The kids don't care and I didn't expect an amazing product. At the same time, I also wasn't expecting junk.
customer_reviews.author: PWH

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. The hoop is not properly designed to attach to the backboard so falls off whenever ANYTHING touches it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pinckley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I got this last year for our nephews . It was easy to set up and they both love it! It's nice you can change the height so it can grow with them while they are little! Still in great condition after a year! Only down side is I wish it came with the sand to weight it down.
customer_reviews.author: Joy walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy & fun
customer_reviews.text: My son just got this for his 2nd birthday. It was easy to assemble. The directions were not needed until we got to attaching the net and that was more difficult then expected. It is done though and looks great. The 3 balls came inflated which was a bonus that I did not expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, goood quality
customer_reviews.text: Have just had this couple weeks, but my kids love it! We keep it inside and haven't had to put sand in it even with my husband and I shooting the ball from across the only thing is that the net does come undone once in a while on one of the hooks. But it's easy to reattach. Balls are great and seem durable. My 2 and 4 year olds love this. Amazon was the only place that had this product include 3 balls, everywhere else like Walmart and toys r us only included 1 ball with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: This is not the classic Little Tikes basketball set!
customer_reviews.text: We had a Little Tikes basketball set 20-30 years ago when our children were growing up. Now we have a 3 year old and one year old grandson and wanted the same thing for them to play with at our house. This came and it is smaller, less sturdy, less attractive, and generally cheaper quality. The net they give doesn't fit the rim, the rim is cheap-looking and falls off, the balls are smaller (which they have to be because the whole set is smaller) and look like they were purchased at a dollar store--3/$1. Disappointed in Little Tikes!
customer_reviews.author: soonerfan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our one year old, he doesn’t get the concept yet but my husband and I have fun shooting hoops in it:) I like that it’s kind of light so when our son knocks it down I don’t worry about it hurting him. The net doesn’t stay in place super well.. we are constantly looping them back into place. We might glue them or something. Other than that we are happy:)
customer_reviews.author: Christy Bonham

customer_reviews.title: I love Little Tikes Products
customer_reviews.text: I have loved Little Tikes Products since my own children were small, now I'm buying them for their children. This basketball set was a big hit at my 2 year-old-grandson's birthday party. I'm not sure who loved it more, the kids or the adults.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Lupton Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 20-month-old granddaughter for Christmas 2018. She loves it. It comes with 3 balls that differ slightly in size, and the durable adjustable stand is easy to resize and will grow with her. Be advised that it doesn't come in a prepackaged box; all of the pieces are loaded into a plain cardboard shipping box. However, this turned out to be a plus for a toddler who doesn't have much patience for opening fancy packaging anyway 😂
customer_reviews.author: Susan Z.

customer_reviews.title: It does tip over easily inside the house as it's on carpet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old grandson for his birthday. He loves it. His birthday is in January and we live in New England, so, he plays with it inside for now. The base is made to be able to put water inside of it to keep it secure. It does tip over easily inside the house as it's on carpet, but, I'm assuming that that will change when we can put it outside in the spring, and put water in the base. The balls are made well and aren't too hard or soft. I don't worry that they will break anything. I will come back to this review in the spring/summer when we get it outside!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey K.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable size on this broke within the first week so we were unable to raise it any higher. With the first month, the hoop piece started leaning on the right side. Not pleased with this purchase :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one years ago for my son (when he was his one) and he loved it. When my second son was one, he played with it and loved it too. They (and their little friends) played with it for years. It's a great buy and will last a long time....so I thought...what the heck...I bought it for my grandson's first birthday. He loves it! He gets so excited when he makes a basket.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - hoop doesn’t stay in place at all!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandsons 3rd birthday, this comes with 3 basketballs and after the first shot the hoop falls down - literally the entire hoop falls to the foor. There is nothing to keep the hoop secured or locked into place. Don’t waste your time or money on this cuz you’ll be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mel2020

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Easy Score Basketball Set, Blue, 3 Balls - Amazon Exclusive
product_meta.description: Style:StandardThe Little Tikes easy score basketball set, designed for children 18 months to 5 years old, introduces kids of all abilities to the game of basketball and competitive play. The height can be adjusted to six settings between 2.5 and 4 feet to accommodate even the littlest hoop Star. The oversize rim and kid-size basketball ensure easy scoring and help kids develop hand-eye coordination while providing the right challenge level. Before play, add sand to the base for stability.
feature_bullets: Indoor and outdoor basketball hoop adjusts to six heights from 2.5 to 4 feet
Includes an oversized rim and 3 Junior size basketballs
Develops social, motor skills and coordination
Base can be weighted with sand (not included) for stability

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars10,960 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
